images.copyright: The sculpture 'Kindred Spirits' by Alex Pentek in Bailick Park, Midleton, County Cork, Ireland (© David Creedon/Alamy Live News/Alamy)
images.title: Celebrating Native American Heritage Month
images.caption: Native American Heritage Month
images.desc: Today, on the first day of Native American Heritage Month, we're visiting Bailick Park in County Cork, Ireland. Why come to the Emerald Isle on a day meant to honor the contributions of Native Americans? The answer lies in a tale of shared humanity that begins in the 19th century.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
